lines.text: I is the robber and you is the robbee!
I think I kill both of ya!
Now wait a minute! I said I didn't have the money here. I didn't say I didn't know where it was.
Yeah, we go somewhere! I get on my horse, I go get the money and come back!
You go? Come back? Kill him!
Hold it! No, no! Look, I think you misunderstand my plan! See, I go...I leave my amigo here. If I don't come back you kill him!
I don't like that idea. I go get the money...you kill him!
I wish people would stop calling me amigo. That always means something bad is about to happen.
This is a great country! Why, as far as the eye can see, there ain't nothing but country! And someday, there's gonna be more country! That's the kind of guy I am... a country guy!
Do you have any last words before we kill you senor?
